name: Spire Law
headline: Tech enabled business and employment litigation law firm.
description: Spire Law represents businesses and business owners in litigation. Spire Tech Services supports the technology development and marketing for Spire Law. Spire Tech Services was part of the Winter 2019 batch.

# SPIRE LAW 
Business Defense Attorneys serving 
Florida, New York, Georgia, Massachusetts, & California
## ABOUT
Spire Law's attorneys have defended more than 1,000 businesses and business owners in Federal and State litigation. Created with the support of [Y Combinator](https://spirelawfirm.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/>), Spire Law leverages uniquely designed technology to provide exceptional service to its clients. This innovative approach allows us to efficiently handle complex legal matters, ensuring that our clients receive the best possible representation with expertise that you can trust. 
See our [Federal litigation experience on CourtListener](https://spirelawfirm.com/<https:/www.courtlistener.com/?q=\(%22Jesse%22%20AND%20%22Unruh%22\)%20OR%20\(%22Jamie%22%20AND%20%22White%22\)%20OR%20\(%22Ian%22%20AND%20%22Smith%22\)%20OR%20\(%22Alyssa%22%20AND%20%22Castelli%22\)&type=r&order_by=dateFiled%20desc&filed_after=01%2F01%2F2019&atty_name=\(%22Jesse%22%20AND%20%22Unruh%22\)%20OR%20\(%22Heather%22%20AND%20%22Meglino%22\)%20OR%20\(%22Whitney%22%20AND%20%22DuPree%22\)%20%20OR%20\(%22Ashwin%22%20AND%20%22Trehan%22\)%20%20OR%20\(%22Alyssa%22%20AND%20%22Castelli%22\)&court=flmd%20flnd%20flsd%20gamd%20gand%20gasd%20nyed%20nynd%20nysd%20nywd>).
​
OUR VISION
![Hands on Computer Keyboard](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/a4c2cb93c023484c94366e7246cee0e5.jpg/v1/fill/w_101,h_67,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Hands%20on%20Computer%20Keyboard.jpg)
#### Spire Law Aggressivelyand Efficiently helps businesses and business owners using state of the art technology.
Our mission is to make legal representation more accessible to people involved in legal matters, leaving them more empowered in decisions affecting their lives and businesses. We do this through open lines of communication with clients, excellent litigation defense, and knowledgeable, experienced attorneys.
PRACTICE AREAS
## [PRACTICE AREAS](https://spirelawfirm.com/<https:/www.spirelawfirm.com/practice-areas>)
### At Spire Law, we specialize in a comprehensive range of practice areas to meet your business's needs for general litigation and labor and employment matters. Our experience in labor and employment includes (but is not limited to) Fair Labor Standards Act ([FLSA](https://spirelawfirm.com/<https:/www.spirelawfirm.com/flsa-claims-attorney-florida>)) litigation (individual and collective actions), Americans with Disabilities Act ([ADA](https://spirelawfirm.com/<https:/www.spirelawfirm.com/disability-lawyer-florida>)) matters, Title VII discrimination claims, retaliation claims, Family and Medical Leave Act ([FMLA](https://spirelawfirm.com/<https:/www.spirelawfirm.com/florida-fmla-defense-attorney>)) compliance and claims, and Equal Employment Opportunity Commission ([EEOC](https://spirelawfirm.com/<https:/www.spirelawfirm.com/florida-eeoc-defense-attorney>)) charges of discrimination. We have also represented companies in contract disputes, shareholder derivative actions, cases involving Florida's deceptive and unfair and trade practices act, and a variety of other types of claims from pre-suit negotiation to litigation, arbitration, and mediation, addressing all manner of business disputes.
### [Learn More](https://spirelawfirm.com/<https:/www.spirelawfirm.com/practice-areas>)
[Contact An Attorney](https://spirelawfirm.com/<https:/www.spirelawfirm.com/contact-us>)
[Book A Consultation](https://spirelawfirm.com/<https:/calendly.com/spire-law-attorneys>)
## REVIEWS
> "Spire Law reviewed my physician employer contract and helped explain the unfamiliar terminology as well as the limitations after the contract expires. The turn around was super fast. I highly recommend Jesse!"
> ​
#### Eleanor Graham, M.D.
"Just had a consult with Attorney Ian Smith for my online retail client that was recently sued for ADA website violations. He was generous with his time and also very helpful and knowledgeable about the specific area of law (far out of my practice area) and seemed quite practical in his approach. If I can't get the matter resolved, I will certainly send my client to him."
​
Boris L.
> "Excellent service! Jesse and his team went above and beyond to get us a fast resolution, saving us money and time. Jesse also offered valuable consultation to save money in the future. I would absolutely recommend Spire Law for your legal needs, they did a great job!"
​
Rachel P.

generated_description:
### Spire Law: Revolutionizing Legal Representation

**Overview**  
Founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator's Winter 2019 batch, Spire Law is a cutting-edge law firm based in Orlando, Florida. With a core mission to empower businesses through tech-enabled legal representation, they focus on business and employment litigation across multiple states, including Florida, New York, Georgia, Massachusetts, and California.

**Team and Structure**  
Spire Law operates with a dedicated team of 10 employees, spearheaded by Group Partner Nan. They work in tandem with Spire Tech Services, which enhances their technological capabilities and marketing strategies. This dual approach allows Spire Law to innovate in a historically traditional field.

**What They Do**  
Spire Law has successfully defended over 1,000 businesses and business owners in various federal and state litigations. Their expertise spans a wide range of practice areas—ranging from general litigation to labor and employment matters, including Fair Labor Standards Act (FLSA) claims, Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) issues, and Title VII discrimination cases. They handle everything from contract disputes to mediation and arbitration, tailoring their services to meet the unique needs of each client.

**Technology-Driven Approach**  
Their unique selling proposition lies in leveraging technology to provide efficient and effective legal solutions. By utilizing state-of-the-art systems, Spire Law ensures that clients have open lines of communication and excellent representation, ultimately making legal processes less daunting.

**Client-Centric Vision**  
Spire Law aspires to make legal representation accessible and empowering. They pride themselves on providing quick turnarounds and comprehensive assistance, garnering glowing testimonials from past clients, who highlight the firm's effectiveness, responsiveness, and deep understanding of complex legal matters.

**Moving Forward**  
While they may be a relatively young firm, Spire Law's innovative approach positions them as a formidable player in the legal landscape. As businesses continue to navigate a complex legal environment, Spire Law stands prepared to meet their needs with both expertise and efficiency.

**Connect with Spire Law**  
To learn more about how Spire Law can assist your business or to book a consultation, visit their website at [Spire Law Firm](https://spirelawfirm.com).
